abstract: Links on the work and lives of Alvin E. Roth and Lloyd S. Shapley, recipients of this year’s Nobel Memorial Prize in Economic Science for their research on market design.
snippet: Links on the work and lives of Alvin E. Roth and Lloyd S. Shapley, recipients of this year’s Nobel Memorial Prize in Economic Science for their research on market design.
lead_paragraph: On Monday the Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences awarded the Nobel Memorial Prize in Economic Science to Alvin E. Roth and Lloyd S. Shapley for their work on market design. Here’s some further reading on the recipients, the prize and the field of matching and market design.

headline.main: The Nobel Winners: A Reading List
